parameter.name: LEFT_DEADZONE_FORWARD
parameter.comment: Lowest PWM signal to begin moving the car forward (between 0 and 1)

parameter.name: LEFT_DEADZONE_BACKWARD
parameter.comment: Lowest PWM signal to begin moving the car backward (between 0 and -1.0)

parameter.name: RIGHT_DEADZONE_FORWARD
parameter.comment: Lowest PWM signal to begin moving the car forward (between 0 and 1)

parameter.name: RIGHT_DEADZONE_BACKWARD
parameter.comment: Lowest PWM signal to begin moving the car backward (between 0 and -1.0)
